description.value: Comedians are bards Bards that thrive on lighthearted and uplifting performance. Their aim is to treat their audiences to a laugh and help them put their cares aside for a while. Ironically, you might not want to fall completely for their jolly demeanor - let your guard fall too far and you might just end up the unwitting volunteer for their next prank!

system.classDetails:
Bardic Archetype: Comedian

Unlock: Have the Bard Starter Abilities.

🆓 Given Abilities: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.XS4831HQBSH7W2M4]{Theme: Levity}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.UT2MT6HXQ4PUJKCF]{People Person}

Comedian Abilities

When taking a level in Comedian, you may choose from the following abilities:

Options: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.TJ4VKZYFH31W9X3V]{Prop Weapons}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.7RD3VKTZ5NAWVBRS]{Self-Insert}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.YNYRG1OSHNZ1HDC1]{Bloopers}, @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.OS4PU32OTOKG859U]{Slapstick}
